original_text: And they shall take up a lamentation for thee, and say to thee, How art thou destroyed, that wast inhabited of seafaring men, the renowned city, which wast strong in the sea, she and her inhabitants, which cause their terror to be on all that haunt it!
korean_text: 그들이 너를 위하여 슬픈 노래를 불러 이르기를 항해자가 살았던 유명한 성읍이여 너와 너의 주민이 바다 가운데에 있어 견고하였도다 해변의 모든 주민을 두렵게 하였더니 어찌 그리 멸망하였는고

sentences.original_text: And they shall take up a lamentation for thee
that wast inhabited of seafaring men
which wast strong in the sea
which cause their terror to be on all that haunt it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 공포를 그곳에 머무는 모든 자에게 나타나게 하던
